body:
It's possibly the racy bug introduced in git commit 019f8eb658 aka https://go-review.googlesource.com/10623 which fixed the linux/X11 breakage in git commit 068a51c195 aka https://go-review.googlesource.com/10452 which changed the app/gl threading model.

If you sync back to git commit 0d468be861, are you still broken on your Kubuntu machine? Does your Ubuntu machine still work?
